diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+(ns athens.components.todo
+  (:require
+    [athens.db :as db]
+    [athens.util :refer [now-ts]]
+    [re-frame.core :refer [dispatch]]))
+
+
+(defn todo-on-click
+  [uid from-str to-str]
+
+  (let [current-block-content (get (db/get-block [:block/uid uid]) :block/string)]
+    (dispatch [:transact [{:db/id [:block/uid uid]
+                           :block/string (clojure.string/replace
+                                           current-block-content
+                                           from-str
+                                           to-str)
+                           :edit/time (now-ts)}]])))
+
+
+(def component-todo
+  {:match #"\[\[TODO\]\]"
+   :render (fn [content uid]
+             [:span [:input {:type     "checkbox"
+                             :z-index  5
+                             :class    "component-todo"
+                             :on-click #(todo-on-click uid #"\{\{\[\[TODO\]\]\}\}" "{{[[DONE]]}}")
+                             :id       (str content uid)}]])})
+
+
+(def component-done
+  {:match #"\[\[DONE\]\]"
+   :render (fn [content uid]
+             [:span [:input {:type     "checkbox"
+                             :z-index  5
+                             :class    "component-todo"
+                             :checked  "true"
+                             :on-click #(todo-on-click uid #"\{\{\[\[DONE\]\]\}\}" "{{[[TODO]]}}")
body:
Is it possible (or necessary) to try to refactor TODO pattern matching? Doing something similar in keybindings (`cmd-enter` to cycle).

https://github.com/athensresearch/athens/blob/a1ef4526270d60eb9d5e7f405a263f00efaac8f1/src/cljs/athens/keybindings.cljs#L176-L178
